overview_of_class: The first course of the two quarter MMSS econometrics methods sequence. Most of this course is devoted to the multi-variate linear regression model, covering both econometric theory and applications. Topics include: the simple regression model, multiple regression analysis, large sample properties of OLS, regression analysis with qualitative information, heteroskedasticity, and specification and data problems. Prerequisite: second-year standing in MMSS.
name: Econometrics for MMSS
subject: MATH
